name: Aurora KaneVax
notes:
Open to all Illinois residents 16 and older. (Residents that are 16 or 17 years of age will need a guardian to accompany them to give consent.)

Online registration and onsite registration are available. Walk-ins are also welcome, subject to vaccine availability.

Residents will not be turned away for not having identification.

name: Des Plaines Mass Vaccination Site

1155 East Oakton St.
Des Plaines, IL 60018
notes: WALK-INs allowed Mon-Sat, 8:30-5pm. All Illinois residents 16+ may be vaccinated at this site. Call 833-308-1988 to check for appointments or secure an appointment on the website. Must sign up on website ahead of time for registration code.

name: Doctors Test Centers

name: Kane County Mass Vaccination Site
notes:
Open to all Illinois residents 16 and older. (Residents that are 16 or 17 years of age will need a guardian to accompany them to give consent.)

Online registration and onsite registration are available. Walk-ins are also welcome, subject to vaccine availability.

Residents will not be turned away for not having identification. 

There is a standby list for any remaining first shot doses they MAY have after the clinics. If interested in being on this list, please email McalisterKierra@co.kane.il.us and provide a phone number.
